Text.Page:
Our workers are encountering difficulties with local fauna in Tuwangi Mire.

Please eliminate the {@LinkCreature:5#14#muddy sporewalkers}, {@LinkCreature:5#15#hungry cullars}, and {@LinkCreature:5#16#tentacullars}.

Report to Gara at the Tuwangi Garrison when mission is complete.

Wow, check you out! You really went to town!

Great work!
The work here is sort of at a stand-still. It'll probably stay like that until those creatures out in the forest are finally taken care of.
